text: Is there anything new on this topic? It would be nice if I could define own classes per area.
Nothing yet, Thomas. We’re doing a ton of work on the CMS, right now, and will certainly continue to discuss this problem as we move forward.
I realized yesterday that Smart Content is not available using Drag and Drop Pages. Is that on the roadmap?

This seems like a pretty simple feature to add (haha, I know, that’s easy to say from my end). Is there a technical challenge or is it something that doesn’t have buy-in as something that should be available?
if you use rich text in dnd you can still make it smart… just not with custom modules

is there a common class the editor can add to full-width rows (and even a common one for containers)?
Currently the editor is adding a different class for each section. (And they’re insanely long, see below)
• `body_dnd_area-row-0-force-full-width-section` 
• `body_dnd_area-row-2-force-full-width-section`
